answers.answer: I have had preeclampsia twice!! I had to be induced at 34 weeks my first pregnancy because my daughter was growth restricted. She weighed 3lbs 7oz and was in the NICU for 14 days. My second pregnancy, they did an emergency c-section at 32 weeks because my son was growth restricted and he was in fetal distress. He was 2lbs 6oz and stayed in the NICU for 5 weeks. Preeclampsia is a very scary thing and can be very dangerous to u and the baby!! Take Cate of yourself!!!! Try not to stress!! If u feel like something is wrong, or u have pain above your ribs, or u cant get rid of a headache and u are swollen, go to the er...don't wait!!!

My sis in law had it and had an emergency c section at 10w early. It's a seriouss thing. Just make sure your Dr is paying attention to it. If you feel like she is blowing you off, go get a second opinion. It's worth checking and being safe. On the bright side, they can do amazing things to help you and baby get through it. Just stay positive

I have the swelling & headaches and im being to by my doc I need more protein and vitamin B because it can lead to pre clampsia .im also getting blood work done to see if she needs to get me on meds. Make sure to have a low sodium diet & make sure to get the proper treatment from your doc or let them know your gonna change doctors .
I'm freaking out. I'm not concerned about me just concerned for my daughter. Did I do something to maybe cause this?

I had pre eclampsia its very serious my blood pressure was 130 I was admitted to the ER january 8th 2014. My baby and I was monitored 3 days and my urine test came back 250 at the border for preeclampsia if it were had been 300 I would of stayed longer. Any who I was released on medication with 30 mg of procardia. However , the following week my blood pressure elevated to 150 causing placenta abruption my medication failed to work. I was rushed to the ER january 15 2014 as I was losing blood and my baby its oxygen. I had started preterm labor/contraction. My baby no longer moved and I jad to undergo emergency c section at 27 weeks and 6 days :-(He is my miracle he was born 3 months early and he is still in the nicu. Hopefully he will be home soon:-)Please if you feel something is not right go to the ER and havenyourself checked.life in Nicu has not been easy it is hard scary and sad but both my baby and I have stayed strong and are almost there. GOOD LUCK:-)

No careful pre eclampsia is never caused by yourself...it is caused my stress and health issues in the past with blood pressure. I used to feel guilty after what happen to me but both my doctor and social worker made me understand I did nothing wrong to cause it. When having a baby early you find yourself with mixed emotions.

question: Does anyone else have this or has had it? I went to the hospital a couple of days ago because of swelling and headache but they said my blood work came back fine. I go to see the doctor today now she wants me to come back wednesday morning to check. Am I missing something? The hospital didn't seem concerned. But I keep getting headaches and I'm still swollen. Also today they checked my blood pressure. It was 135/65.
title: Pre eclamsia please help
